glsa.title: Evince: Stack overflow in included gv code
glsa.synopsis: Evince improperly handles user-supplied data possibly allowing for the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: Evince is a document viewer for multiple document formats, including PostScript.

description.p: Evince includes code from GNU gv that does not properly boundary check user-supplied data before copying it into process buffers.

impact.p: An attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted PostScript document with Evince and possibly execute arbitrary code with the rights of the user running Evince.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Evince users should upgrade to the latest version:
